title: Artie Shaw - In Hollywood 1940-41 Vol. 1 & 2 (2 CD) Hep
description:
ARTIE SHAW & HIS ORCHESTRA - IN HOLLYWOOD 1940-41 VOL. 1 & 2

2 CDs released in 1997 on the Hep label.

Session info on scans.

These are broadcast performances of the big band with strings.

"It is the contention of this writer that the tonality Shaw evinced from his instrument directly appeals to pleasure centers in our aural sensibilities. And if we can 'hear beyond' the call of the ascendant tenor saxophone and changes in musical fashion, his is an instrumental voice that still speaks to our soul."
